text: Pancreatic cancer is cancer in the pancreas. It has a poor prognosis, with about 11% of patients surviving beyond five years after the cancer has been diagnosed. ==Symptoms== *Weight loss *Nausea *Jaundice *Abdominal *minal *Fever And pain. ==Treatment== In cases of localized pancreatic disease, the surgery to remove the cancer is often the first treatment. It is typically followed by chemotherapy, often with Gemzar or 5-FU. Category:Medicine Category:Cancer C Category:Diseases and disorders of the digestive system
title: Pancreatic cancer
